channel.description: Recent content in Java on Gitai.me

item.title: Uninstall OpenJDK and install Oracle JDK on Linux
item.description: Java is a programming technology originally developed by Sun Microsystems and later acquired by Oracle. Oracle Java is a proprietary implementation for Java that is free to download and use for commercial use, but not to redistribute, therefore it is not included in a officially maintained repository.
